doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.AdminFilter
The main method of the admin filter, which operating the check whether the user has an admin facade (if not - the system sends the user to the login page)
doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.CompanyFilter
The main method of the company filter, which operating the check whether the user has an company facade (if not - the system sends the user to the login page)
doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.CustomerFilter
The main method of the customer filter, which operating the check whether the user has an customer facade (if not - the system sends the user to the login page)
doPost(String, String, ClientType, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.loginServlet.LoginServlet
This method gets the data from the login page inputs and redirects the user (admin/company/customer) to the relevant page
